articles.title: NASA's Gigantic Crawler on the Move As Rollout of Mega Moon Rocket Inches Closer - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Yesterday, engineers and technicians at NASA’s Kennedy Space Center in Florida drove Crawler Transporter-2, which will carry NASA’s Moon rocket to the launch pad, to the doors of the Vehicle Assembly Building (VAB). Soon, the 6.6-million-pound crawler will go…
articles.content: Engineers and technicians at NASA’s Kennedy Space Center in Florida drove Crawler Transporter-2 on March 11, 2022 to the doors of the Vehicle Assembly Building (VAB). Soon, it will go inside the VAB … [+3594 chars]

articles.title: Solar storm warning: Earth faces 'triple threat' from space as 'direct impact' predicted - Express
articles.description: A SOLAR storm is predicted to hit the planet in a 'direct hit' this Monday.

articles.title: Scientists baffled after finding to bizarre 'blobs' deep inside Earth: 'Implications!' - Express

articles.author: Jonathan Chadwick
articles.title: Astronomer captures photos of distant nebulas from a telescope in his East Ayrshire back garden - Daily Mail
articles.description: Bryan Shaw, 28, has spent hours tracking the night sky to produce stunning images of nebulas and star clusters thousands of light years away from his New Cumnock home.
articles.content:
A Scottish amateur astronomer has captured stunning photos of distant nebulas and other astronomical marvels from a telescope in his East Ayrshire garden.
